text: Whenever I see or hear the word funk I have to double take
author: The WahMaster

text:
The best Tekken Game for me so far.
I hated Tekken 6 because of his stupid plot and Alisa, the Campaign mode was even more disappointing, I prefer the storytelling in Tekken 5 that means 2-4 Cutscenes per fighter.
Tekken Tag Tournament was extremely fun and also the fact that it is a Spinoff/Non-Canon game makes it more enjoyable to play and the Tag mode makes the game even faster.﻿
author: Owari Dragon

text: Stats watch: This is the fourth Tekken track to appear on the list. ﻿ Of the six main games, only Tekken 1 and 3 are unrepresented. This is song also marks the 551st game on this list. That's more games than you could line end to end in my living room.
